name: Good Nightmare
description:
Good Nightmare is a 2D platformer where you play as a Native American girl named Goshi. She was gifted by the Spider Grandmother the ability to traverse people's dreams and nightmares. Goshi must now face her own fears by grappling, running, and jumping through tricky platforming puzzles.

This game is a group project for a team of four students from Lawrence Technological University. We are working on this game for one of our studio classes where a team of artists and programmers come together to make a game over the course of one semester.
